description: Russia's embassy in Prague asks for police protection in response to the report on Czech TV.
title: Czech media name Russian diplomat in 'poison plot' row
title_page: Czech media name Russian diplomat in 'poison plot' row - BBC News
maintext: Without naming him, the embassy said on its Facebook page that a member of its staff was the target of an "anti-Russian information campaign" and that it had been forced to apply for police protection for him. It said the diplomat was the victim of a "slander campaign" whipped up by Czech media.
